sections.details: Develop machine learning pipelines for personalization including data labeling, model training, and A/B rollout.

Invoices will be submitted on a monthly basis. The first 100 hours per quarter are billed at a rate of $150 per hour. Any hours after the 100th hour are billed at a discounted rate of $125 per hour. Payment terms are Net 30.
This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California. All work performed under this agreement is considered confidential and the intellectual property of Global Innovations Corp.
